application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 12 (Submission of Verification Report for approved drainage/SuDS for Section 1, Section 2 and Section 3 - Blocks E and F) of planning permission ref. 73955/APP/2022/2613, dated 20/03/2023: Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2, 3 and 5 of application reference 73955/APP/2021/3362 dated 20-01-2022 (Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2 and 3 of application reference 73955/APP/2020/139 (Demolition of existing buildings for residential-led mixed use development comprising buildings between 3 and 11 storeys to provide residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor employment floorspace (Use Class B1) with associated access and car and cycle parking, landscape and amenity areas and associated servicing) to link internal corridors, relocate the consented gym use, relocate a duplex unit, change duplex units to single level, amend the refuse strategy and amend the layout of the car park & cycle stores) to include a second staircase, reduction in car parking, change to energy strategy, internal flat changes to address fire regulations, change to residential unit mix, and amendments to landscaping.
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 12 for Section 1, Section 2 and Section 3 - Blocks E and F) of planning permission ref. 73955/APP/2022/2613, dated 20/03/2023 as defined within drawing numbers: 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-01-DR-A-010102 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-01-DR-A-010103 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-02-DR-A-010104 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-03-DR-A-010105 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-RF-DR-A-010112 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-00-DR-A-010101 Rev P01; accompanying non-material amendment application 73955/APP/2025/604. Further details are required in order to fully discharge the condition for all other parts of the development as defined on these plans.
